name: Stylable
description: Provides convenience methods that serialize objects into inline style or classes for attribute binding.

methods.name: styleBlock
methods.description: Returns an array of styles to be used in attribute binding.

arguements.name: styles
arguements.description: An object containing styles desired to be set.

methods.name: classBlock
methods.description: Returns an array of classes to be used in attribute binding.

arguements.name: classes
arguements.description: An object containing the classes to be used in attribute binding.
